message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm confident that this product can generate significant returns for you.  I'm willing to let you have it for $1500000. This is a price point that reflects both the product's potential and my desire to see it succeed in your hands.  Let me know your thoughts.
